result.title: Detailed assessment of the RES innovations and GPPs on SMEs financial constraints
result.description: Description Based on data collected in WP 2 and the analysis in D35 this deliverable provides a multivariate analysis on how RES innovations and GPPs affect SMEs funding gaps and help local governments implementing their needs for RES innovationsIndicator for success Detailed empirical evidence and insights of the impact of RES innovations and GPP on SMEs funding gaps evidence based advice on how to use RES innovations and GPP to overcome funding gaps Results from the multivariate analysis are available and reports conveying the results in an understandable way to the relevant audiences are published Feedback from XPRESS partners and relevant stakeholders will be crucial at this point
